definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在进行投资决定前，你会先详阅综合现金流量表。

sentences.english: Analyze free cash flow discount method in the application of the applicability of our country;
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，自由现金流量折现法在我国的具体运用。

sentences.english: Let’s say you want to do a cash flow statement for the past year.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，你想建立去年的现金流量表。

sentences.english: Strict cash-basis follows the cash flow exactly.
sentences.chinese: 严格现金基础的现金流量如下到底。

sentences.english: The enterprise is obliged to pay the cash flow it receives to the final recipient in a timely manner.
sentences.chinese: 有义务将收取的现金流量及时支付给最终收款方。

sentences.english: Like so much in the world of finance, the cash flow statement is not straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 就像财务世界的很多东西一样，现金流量表也不简单。

sentences.english: We went over this a bit last week in preparing the cash flow statement.
sentences.chinese: 上月我们准备现金流量表表时谈到过这个话题。

sentences.english: Understand the differences between the direct and the indirect SCF .
sentences.chinese: 了解直接法与间接法现金流量表的不同。

sentences.english: The preparation of the statement of cash flows is over.
sentences.chinese: 现金流量表的编制工作也就完成了。

sentences.english: The company has some cash flow problems.
sentences.chinese: 该公司现金流量有些问题。

sentences.english: This paper discusses how to disclose the cash flow in cash flow tables.
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论了如何在现金流量表中对其进行列报。

sentences.english: Distinguish between the three sections of the SCF .
sentences.chinese: 区别现金流量表的三个部分。

sentences.english: Research on the postulates of cash flow management.
sentences.chinese: 对现金流量管理假设的研究。

sentences.english: Many businesses fail because they fall into the trap of ignoring their cash flow.
sentences.chinese: 由于忽视现金流量问题，导致许多企业失败。

sentences.english: Research on cash flow management theory system.
sentences.chinese: 对现金流量管理理论体系的研究。

sentences.english: I’ve never been that interested in the Cash Flow Statement per se.
sentences.chinese: 本质上，我从来没有对现金流量表产生过兴趣。

definition: to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
